title: Shonibare The Swing-reference to Dutch wax fabric

content.question: When creating The Swing (after Fragonard), Yinka Shonibare included cultural references by doing which of the following?

choices.label: Basing his work on a scene from a popular theatrical play
Reusing materials employed by a Romantic sculptor
Using a modern textile in the style of nineteenth-century Dutch wax fabric
Alluding to the setting of an English garden landscape

content.answer: Using a modern textile in the style of nineteenth-century Dutch wax fabric

topic.text: 10.3: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
